content.text:
# Draft:Stand Up Assembly Software

Across the nation a variety of assemblies are gathering people sharing self governing Uniform Commercial Code contract discharge for credit enforcement. The estate formation process uses Law of Commerce based business trusts to build commercial credit that can then be applied in Law of Commerce transactions. The best use of the platform is the International Public Notice feature for any lawful and legal notice. The registered member may also privately and publicly store records to have a recorded date of notice that is securely password protected.
The Duplin County Assembly [https://standup.land/ Stand Up] North Carolina has engaged with Stand Up to build their community and often alerts the community with all the assembly function alerts using the chat log feature. Resources and knowledge have a variety of documents to learn American Common Law.
References
